Key Match Events: Jamal Musiala scored a solo wonder goal
Florian Wirtz and Jamal Musiala combined to assist each other and add some gloss to the scoreline
Niclas Fullkrug, Florian Wirtz, Aleksandar Pavlovic, and Kai Havertz were also on target
Germany led 1-0 after 27 minutes when Fullkrug tapped in Musiala's cross
Germany doubled their lead in the 58th minute with Musiala driving through the Hungary half and slotting the ball into the bottom corner
Germany extended their lead to 3-0 in the 66th minute with Wirtz sneaking a low effort in at the near post
Aleksandar Pavlovic scored Germany's fourth goal in the 78th minute
Kai Havertz scored the fifth goal from the penalty spot in the 81st minute
Post-Match Reflections: Jamal Musiala had a hat-trick of assists on the night
Both Musiala and Wirtz made sure they did the dirty work to win the most duals of anyone else on the pitch (9)
Another sublime offensive performance from a sublime player, who also made sure he did the dirty work to win the most duals of anyone else on the pitch (9)
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dominik Szoboszlai made a goal-line clearance
Niclas Fullkrug missed a one-on-one chance against the goalkeeper
